Blog.post: I forgot to make my first post observable and pretty!!
IT'S GETTING HOT IN HERE, LET'S TAKE OFF ALL UR CLOTHES.... UH OH.... jannnnx

Jan!!! Oliiin big time!! i was exhausted right, after all that jumping around in our hip hop class and that great bowl of penang laksa. Was dragged around the mall by bf afterwards who forced me to study the electric banquent pans with him. Bought one. Oliin...both of our pockets koyak liaw.Then went to hunt for knives. So boring!! he is so particular! must like this must like that. *toiiink* didn't buy a knife but he said, tomorrow must go to Warehouse and see got good knives a not! I was already running towards the opposite direction.... Oh yah, bout the oliiin part. we came home around 5 something right. and i plopped into the bed right away. When i woke up, it was almost 2 a.m. Oliinnn...my precious night time watching awesome tv shows are gone. just like that. and i'm stuck with porn ads and people promoting funny products. Anyway, that's not the best worst part. Guess what i saw when i woke up. A big plate of chicken noodles with broccoli! (courtesy of bf who had a happy time playing with the new electric pan ).Forget not that I didn't have my dinner earlier this evening because I was sleeping like a pig! and now, me pigging out on the noodles and its 2 a.m....the worst time to eat! booohoooo. There goes my diet ( but i was famished!) there goes my diet....Oliiin lohhhh. * start counting/miss counting fat handles * NB: this is even olin than the last post.

oliinnn loh. jan, i broke the damn resolution again. i tried walking past the muffin shelves right, but ended casting furtive glances and shooting out of SuperValue with 2 muffins. i was hoping that you won't see me with my yummy loot. but then again, you don't do grocery shopping right. haiii. Texas triple chocolate and Peach and Cream cheese muffin. See, how could anyone resist?! Before you start beating me up over it, come to my house and i'll loan you a bite or two (no three.cukup). Then we start beating each other up because its real damn nice okies? okies!
hmm. why wouldn't he still talk to me. should i go and harass him? i only meant well... haiiiiii. thus the life of a single silly chinese gorilla in christchurch, new zealand.
harlow ni hau. da jia hau. looks like i'm yapping to myself... its okay. i like it! heh.

wei, ironside thai this friday oi. i couldn't stop giggling when i was trying to book a table there. excited what. but you know what, wrong number....oliiinn... sheesh, i'm not sure what time i'll reach home. if its convenient for you to make the call, book the table for me first okies! under the name, The 3 Gorillas... hahahha! imagine cynthia's expression when the waiter says, ah yes, table for..er, the 3 gorillas... hahahahahhhahah!!! i must stop laughing like that. girl next seat is starting to move away from me...
wei jan, this is damn weird but there is this kiwi girl walking past me and i heard her yelling 'mahai!' at somebody. wtf. that's a hokkien swear word right? wtf? :-O

siaw janice wrote: SONG4U: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU, HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU, HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ZIA HOAY, HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU! By the way, I very sincere one k? I didn't copy and paste each 'HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU' phrase, I actually typed it out with my fingers and sang it in my heart ('coz cannot sing out loud since I'm in the office now) you say siaw a not this carboh. really powered by nuts man..haha. wei, i'm so touched! from last night till now. kamtung overdosed already. i want to hug someone! *hug monitor instead*

janice soon jia yang! we are not going to skip gym to go watch RING. we will watch RING AND sweat our asses off. we are in this together or have you conveniently forgotten? do you want to stop more pants from splitting? do you want to stop saying oliiin, i'm so fat oh so fat? do you want to stop touching more love handles? do you huh? do you do you? hahahahahahaha...
